summary: instanceof checks fail on WorkflowInfo fields because the info object is created outside the VM context, causing type checks like `searchAttributes.CustomIntField instanceof Array` to return false.
userImpact: Users cannot reliably determine types of WorkflowInfo fields using instanceof checks, making type-safe code patterns impossible.
rootCause: WorkflowInfo object is created outside the VM context, so instanceof checks against built-in types fail due to different prototype chains.
proposedFix: Serialize WorkflowInfo to JSON and deserialize it within the VM context to ensure proper prototype chains, or provide type-safe accessors.
workaround: Dump to JSON and reconstruct the object within the workflow VM context.
resolutionDetails: The issue was resolved by ensuring WorkflowInfo objects are properly contextualized within the VM so instanceof checks work correctly.
keyQuote: workflowInfo().searchAttributes.CustomIntField instanceof Array returns false since the info object is created outside the vm
